devdoc.details: Feature that allows spending token allowances.

_spendERC20Tokens(address,address,addres.details: Transfers ERC20 tokens from `owner` to `to`.      Only callable from within.

getAllowanceTarget().details: Get the address of the allowance target.

getSpendableERC20BalanceOf(address,addre.details: Gets the maximum amount of an ERC20 token `token` that can be      pulled from `owner`.

returns.amount: The amount of tokens that can be pulled.
